类 Knight

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChessPiece
      • Knight
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ChessPieceContract
    public class Knight
extends ChessPiece
    Represents a Knight chess piece. The Knight moves in an 'L' shape: two squares in one cardinal direction and then one square perpendicularly.

    The Knight is unique because it is the only piece that can "jump" over other pieces on the board.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 ChessPiece

        col, color, row

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Knight

        public Knight​(int row,
              int col,
              Color color)
        Initializes a Knight with a specific position and color.
        参数:
        row - the initial row index (0-7)
        col - the initial column index (0-7)
        color - the color of the knight (WHITE or BLACK)
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the row or column is outside the 0-7 range

    • 方法详细资料

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove​(int row,
                       int col)
        Checks if the Knight can move to the given coordinates based on the L-shape rule. Valid moves consist of a 2x1 or 1x2 grid displacement.
        参数:
        row - the target row index
        col - the target column index
        返回:
        true if the move is a valid L-shape, false otherwise
